definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Layout problem is a combinatory optimization problem.
sentences.chinese: 佈局問題是一個組合最優化問題。

sentences.english: After doing that, the new generation was selected by synthesizing roulette wheel and optimization selecting.
sentences.chinese: 再結合旋轉輪盤賭和最優化選擇新一代染色體。

sentences.english: The spread of economic calculation is basic to income maximization.
sentences.chinese: 推廣經濟覈算是收入最優化的基礎。

sentences.english: Optimizing Choice of Product Innovation Item Based on Genetic Evolution;
sentences.chinese: 再結合旋轉輪盤賭和最優化選擇新一代染色體。

sentences.english: Value file size optimization to conserve bandwidth.
sentences.chinese: 以數值文件的大小的最優化來保留帶寬。

sentences.english: The steering vector is obtained using gradient-based optimization algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 導向矢量的計算採用基於梯度搜索的最優化算法。

sentences.english: Maximizers want to make the optimal decision.
sentences.chinese: “最大化者”希望做出最優化的決定。

sentences.english: Unconstrained optimization method is used to find out the effect of input information on water-make.
sentences.chinese: 用無約束最優化方法求解各輸入信息對湧水量的影響。

sentences.english: The optimization of the cutting parameters in high-speed cutting is analyzed based on the Taguchi method.
sentences.chinese: 應用田口法對高速切削中切削參數最優化進行了分析。

sentences.english: In this paper, we propose a new class of trust region methods for nonlinear optimization problems.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一類新的解無約束最優化問題的信賴域方法。
遵守搜索引擎最優化策略。

sentences.english: A mix of the genders in bothscience and maths is optimal.
sentences.chinese: 數學與科學學科中，性別混合是最優化的選擇。

sentences.english: So that's the function I want to optimize.
sentences.chinese: 因此這個函數就是我想要最優化的函數。

sentences.english: Finally discussed the optimized design method of the coal machine with the simulation results.
sentences.chinese: 最後探討利用仿真結果對採煤機進行了最優化設計。

sentences.english: The optimizing system arrangment is the key factor for the effective technology transfer of university.
sentences.chinese: 最優化的制度安排是保障高校有效技術轉移的關鍵。

sentences.english: An experimental D-optimum design of 7-component nuclear waste vitrification is established by the extreme venice design method.
sentences.chinese: 用極頂設計法確立最優化7組分玻璃固化體試驗方案。

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3

definition: (music) to change key/modulation/(of an employee) to be transferred to another post
